modName: Save file that skipped the boring bits
summary: A save file that allows me to start again without doing those boring bits
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][u][b]To my future self, this mod is for you. [/b][/u]

Im stuck in bed following Chemo. Skyrim is my medicine. Well it was until last week. 
My wife blew my PC up. It went Boom. Lost all saves, mods, and pics. Porn too. hehehe.
At the moment Im playing on a laptop but i cannot have many mods. And no ENB. So pics are dull. 
I have to start all over, but I was sick of starting Skyrim all over , decided to download a save file from Nexus but all the save files online seemed to be the same. Nothing wrong with them but  i was just tired of starting a new game, visiting Riverwood, and doing the same thing. 

i was sick of Carlotta  complaining about Mikael?
Sick of looking for a mammoth tusk.
Sick of carrying the Golden Claw. think ill go back and steel it, lol.
Amrens silly sword quest. Isn't he man enough to get it himself. 

In this game I have started the quest In my time of need. 
I found Meridias ball thing in Break of Dawn.
Started Blessings of Nature, and am off to the Eldergreen.
I have already smacked Mikael around but if you wanna hit him, then please go ahead .
I have bought Breezehome, but now im broke.

I am up to the Quest, The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller

If this mod is not to your liking, dont complain to me, and dont download it, no skin off my back. 
Mods used in save
[/size][size=5]
[/size][b]REQ-Dawnguard,Hearthfire,Dragonborn and USLEEP[/b]
The Eyes of beauty
KS Hairs
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]True brows[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]I have Xanthy's asa follower because he is cool. Do kids say cool anymore? Anyway he is not needed to use this game. 
[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78797/?[/size][/font]

Download, Unzip, ( I prefer 7zip because it is free and it also opens .zip and .rar files http://www.7-zip.org/) Copy and paste or drag and drop the save game file to your save game folder (Usually C:\Users\your user profile name\Documents\MyGames\Skyrim\Saves) and then play Skyrim.
[size=5]

[/size]Now how do i upload the file.

[size=5]Wifes mod[/size]

Missy The Dragonborn Save Game All Finished by [b]Gamergirl63[/b][/center][size=4][center]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82185/?[/center]



[/size]
author: Unspacey
